**Summary**
• Sierra, a customer service AI agent startup, just raised $350M at a $10B valuation.
• Hundreds of big-name customers like SoFi, Ramp, and Brex are already on board.
• This funding round is a massive bet on AI transforming customer service forever.

Impact — Sierra’s massive funding haul signals the market’s hunger for AI-driven customer service solutions.
